This is absolutely, undoubtedly, unequivocally series/season 2 of the show.

It's ok to be wrong catflap, it happens to the best of us from time to time.  Just don't trust your TV epg, obviously it isn't an ultimate source of information.  You are sitting infront of a computer, so do a simple search for This Is England and you will find out exactly what's what.

*btw, the "have" in my first comment should be "haven't".
